notes.body: Hello Gautam,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #657658305907523584-32688, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the SCALPE PLUS EXPERT ANTI-DANDRUFF SHAMPOO WITH KETOCONAZOLE | 75ML   on 14th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.     We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Gautam,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order #657658305907523584-32688, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of the SCALPE PLUS EXPERT ANTI-DANDRUFF SHAMPOO WITH KETOCONAZOLE | 75ML   on 14th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.
 
Please note that the medicine will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 business days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your original source account within 7-10 business days.
 
We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
 
We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear Sir/Madam,

The subject order was placed on 11/12/25 on pharmeasy app and doctor called
on 12/12/25 @ 07.30 in the morning which was attended by me . The doctor
assured me that the same will be delivered shortly . The pharmeasy app also
notified me then that the same will be delivered on 13/12/25 before 02.00
pm.

Upon checking  the app again on 13/12/2025 for its delivery status was
surprised to find on app that the same will be delivered on 14/12/25 which
is not at all acceptable. Also spoke to customer representative before
writing this mail and was informed that it would be delivered tomorrow ie
on 14/12/2025.Also received an SMS stating Flohale repsules is not
available. Does the app not get updated in the stock of medicines which are
available at the time of placing the order?

Of late the experience of receiving medicines on time have not been adhered
to, by your reputed company . Would request you to please look into this
aspect and let me know the valid reason for the delay. In the past whenever
I have ordered medicines the same would always be delivered the next day
but in this case it is taking 3 days to deliver which is too much to accept
especially for a patient who is aged 85.

On account of this , would surely look into other options if this delay
continue to happen.

Regards
Nathalina Dsouza
Mob: 9324180863

--

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear Sir/Madam,

The subject order was placed on 11/12/25 on pharmeasy app and doctor called on 12/12/25 @ 07.30 in the morning which was attended by me . The doctor assured me that the same will be delivered shortly . The pharmeasy app also notified me then that the same will be delivered on 13/12/25 before 02.00 pm.

Upon checking  the app again on 13/12/2025 for its delivery status was surprised to find on app that the same will be delivered on 14/12/25 which is not at all acceptable. Also spoke to customer representative before writing this mail and was informed that it would be delivered tomorrow ie on 14/12/2025.Also received an SMS stating Flohale repsules is not available. Does the app not get updated in the stock of medicines which are available at the time of placing the order?

Of late the experience of receiving medicines on time have not been adhered to, by your reputed company . Would request you to please look into this aspect and let me know the valid reason for the delay. In the past whenever I have ordered medicines the same would always be delivered the next day but in this case it is taking 3 days to deliver which is too much to accept especially for a patient who is aged 85. 

On account of this , would surely look into other options if this delay continue to happen.

Regards
Nathalina Dsouza

notes.body: Hello Nathalina,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      With regards to your order #658180210088022016-67921, I can see your order is under process and at the bill prepared stage. The estimated delivery date is 13th December 2025 - 14th December 2025.     I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.  Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings.      Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.      I can see the requested medicine FLOHALE 0.5MG 2ML PACKET OF 5 RESPULES was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure all the medicines are delivered to you.   I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.  ​   Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not Arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.   I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     Kindly share a screenshot of the notification showing that the delivery was scheduled for 13/12/2025 before 2:00 PM, so that we can check and assist you further.      Awaiting your earliest response.   Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Nathalina,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With regards to your order #658180210088022016-67921, I can see your order is under process and at the bill prepared stage. The estimated delivery date is 13th December 2025 - 14th December 2025.

I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.

Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings. 

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime. 

I can see the requested medicine FLOHALE 0.5MG 2ML PACKET OF 5 RESPULES was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure all the medicines are delivered to you.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.
​
Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not Arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

Kindly share a screenshot of the notification showing that the delivery was scheduled for 13/12/2025 before 2:00 PM, so that we can check and assist you further. 

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Neeha

notes.body_html:
Hello Nathalina,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

With regards to your order #658180210088022016-67921, I can see your order is under process and at the bill prepared stage. The estimated delivery date is 13th December 2025 - 14th December 2025.

I would like to inform you that the estimated date of delivery depends on the availability of the medicines and the delivery pin code. Also, be informed, PharmEasy will always try to ensure that your order is delivered at the earliest as we completely understand the urgency of the medicine.

Once the order is out for delivery, you will receive an SMS with the contact details of the delivery executive along with the 4-digit pin. Once the details are shared with you, you may coordinate with the delivery executive for exact timings. 

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime. 

I can see the requested medicine FLOHALE 0.5MG 2ML PACKET OF 5 RESPULES was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was removed from your order to ensure all the medicines are delivered to you.

I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.

Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not Arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.

Kindly share a screenshot of the notification showing that the delivery was scheduled for 13/12/2025 before 2:00 PM, so that we can check and assist you further. 

Awaiting your earliest response.

Regards,
Tahera

As per the update from our team, please be informed that the refund of Rs.279.68/- was initiated on 15th December 2025 for the return of 2 quantities of WELLMAN 70 PLUS STRIP OF 10 TABLETS . notes.body_html:
Hello Mukesh,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regard to your order #657056552409960448-97050, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.

As per the update from our team, please be informed that the refund of Rs.279.68/- was initiated on 15th December 2025 for the return of 2 quantities of WELLMAN 70 PLUS STRIP OF 10 TABLETS . The refund will be credited to your payment source account within 5-7 business days. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Madhu,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your order #657293531806502912-53070, We apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.     As per update received from our team, please be informed that we have raised a return request for 01 quantity of theLIVEASY WELLNESS MULTIVITAMIN MULTIMINERAL - IMMUNITY BOOSTER - COMPLETE NUTRITION - BOTTLE OF 60 on 14th December 2025. Please be informed, items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.     Please note that the medicine will be collected within 24 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 48 business hours. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your PharmEasy wallet in 24 hours.      We appreciate your patience in the meantime.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Hello sir, 
Here i have one complaint against your company. PharmEasy - a brand name in online medicine supply. And from last few months, I see a Tagore line of - "same day delivery".
My order id :656872730591002624Order placed on: 8-12-25
Without informing me some medicines are cancelled in the delivering set.Original delivery date is 10th December but on that day I can't get my delivery of medicine. When I call to customer care then I got inform that within 24 hours I will get my delivery Till today when I writing this mail on 13th December time is 7:00 p.m. from your customer care centre she said me we will try to give your medicine today. 
I can't understand that when you are branding in online medicine supply and you have use chain for supply of medicines and I am live in mid City not long distance like as the side of the village. 
Why your company not able to delivery me in time ????
Find the problem and solve that , because due to some other team or person for delivery of medicine name became spoil. 
I have order this medicine for my (senior citizen) father and due to 3 days late delivery till I can't get medicines so I have to purchase this all medicine set from nearby store. I have spend twice money one at your store and second at nearby store.
 who is responsible for this ???

To customer care lady I also request that if your company is not able to provide me my medicine set on before tonight then give me total refund.
And I also say to your company that remove your tagline same day delivery because you are not able to fulfill this line.
Regards, Rajan shah 
--

Without informing me some medicines are cancelled in the delivering set.
Original delivery date is 10th December but on that day I can't get my delivery of medicine. 
When I call to customer care then I got inform that within 24 hours I will get my delivery 
Till today when I writing this mail on 13th December time is 7:00 p.m. from your customer care centre she said me we will try to give your medicine today. 

I can't understand that when you are branding in online medicine supply and you have use chain for supply of medicines and I am live in mid City not long distance like as the side of the village. 

Why your company not able to delivery me in time ????

Find the problem and solve that , because due to some other team or person for delivery of medicine name became spoil. 

I have order this medicine for my (senior citizen) father and due to 3 days late delivery till I can't get medicines so I have to purchase this all medicine set from nearby store. I have spend twice money one at your store and second at nearby store.

 who is responsible for this ???


To customer care lady I also request that if your company is not able to provide me my medicine set on before tonight then give me total refund.

And I also say to your company that remove your tagline same day delivery because you are not able to fulfill this line.

Rajan shah

notes.body: Hello Sagar,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #658759275923398656-14825, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.     As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 13th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future.      We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Sagar,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #658759275923398656-14825, as checked due to some unforeseen circumstances, the order was not delivered to you by the expected date of delivery. Please accept my apologies for the same.

As per the records, your order is delivered to you on 13th December 2025. We have jotted down the details of your experience and PharmEasy will ensure all appropriate actions are taken to prevent similar situations from happening in the future. 

We look forward to having an opportunity to serve you in the future.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. If you have any queries, please feel free to get back to us.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards,
PharmEasy

helpdesk_ticket.description:
Dear PharmEasy Team

I am writing to formally escalate my concern regarding incorrect billing in
my recent PharmEasy order, as the explanation provided by customer care was
not satisfactory.

The following medicines were billed at an old MRP inclusive of 12% GST,
whereas the current applicable GST rate is 5%:

1. Diamicron XR Met 60/500


2. Teniva M Forte


3. Lamitor OD 200



Customer care informed me that the price charged is as per the printed MRP
and that the products were manufactured before the GST revision. However, I
would like to clearly point out that:

GST rate applicability is based on the date of sale, not the date of
manufacture.

When GST is reduced, the benefit of reduced tax must be passed on to the
consumer, irrespective of old stock.

Charging MRP inclusive of higher, outdated GST (12%) when the prevailing
rate is 5% results in excess collection from the consumer.


I am not disputing the product price arbitrarily, but requesting correction
for the GST component embedded in the MRP, which is no longer applicable.

I therefore request PharmEasy to:

1. Re-verify the billing of the above medicines,


2. Calculate the correct price considering 5% GST, and


3. Refund the excess amount charged to original payment source



Order details:

Order ID:657397963244732416

Order Date:09/12/2025


If PharmEasy is unable to process the refund, I request a written
clarification from the billing or compliance team, citing the legal basis
for charging higher GST than applicable.

I hope for a fair and prompt resolution.

Thank you.

Regards,
SOMNATH SEN
Ph-7063691980

--

helpdesk_ticket.subject: Escalation – Excess charges due to outdated GST included in MRP (Order clarification)
helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Dear PharmEasy Team

I am writing to formally escalate my concern regarding incorrect billing in my recent PharmEasy order, as the explanation provided by customer care was not satisfactory.

The following medicines were billed at an old MRP inclusive of 12% GST, whereas the current applicable GST rate is 5%:

1. Diamicron XR Met 60/500


2. Teniva M Forte


3. Lamitor OD 200



Customer care informed me that the price charged is as per the printed MRP and that the products were manufactured before the GST revision. However, I would like to clearly point out that:

GST rate applicability is based on the date of sale, not the date of manufacture.

When GST is reduced, the benefit of reduced tax must be passed on to the consumer, irrespective of old stock.

Charging MRP inclusive of higher, outdated GST (12%) when the prevailing rate is 5% results in excess collection from the consumer.


I am not disputing the product price arbitrarily, but requesting correction for the GST component embedded in the MRP, which is no longer applicable.

I therefore request PharmEasy to:

1. Re-verify the billing of the above medicines,


2. Calculate the correct price considering 5% GST, and


3. Refund the excess amount charged to original payment source 



Order details:

Order ID:657397963244732416

Order Date:09/12/2025


If PharmEasy is unable to process the refund, I request a written clarification from the billing or compliance team, citing the legal basis for charging higher GST than applicable.

I hope for a fair and prompt resolution.

Thank you.

Regards,
SOMNATH SEN
Ph-7063691980
